unnormalised: When sending out invites, remember to include the full address: Venue name, building number, street name, area, city, and the 6-digit PIN code, e.g., "The Grand Ballroom, Hotel Taj Palace, Sardar Patel Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, 110021". This ensures attendees, esp. those using GPS, can easily find the location!
normalised: When sending out invites, remember to include the full address: Venue name, building number, street name, area, city, and the six-digit P-I-N code, for example, "The Grand Ballroom, Hotel Taj Palace, Sardar Patel Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, one one zero zero two one". This ensures attendees, especially those using G-P-S, can easily find the location!
